pages.text: je allaha'e tamara para kura'ana avatarita karyum che, te tamane pharivara prathama jagya'e lavase, kahi do! Ke maro palanahara tene pana khuba sari rite jane che je satya marga para che ane te pana, je spasta rite pathabhrasta che

tamane kyareya teno vicara pana na avyo hato ke tamari tarapha kitaba avatarita karavamam avase, parantu a tamara palanaharani krpathi avatarita thayum, have tame kyareya inkara karanara'oni madada na karaso

dhyana rakho ke a inkara karanara'o tamane allaha ta'alani ayatono pracara karavathi roki na de, tamari tarapha avatarita tha'i gaya pachi, tame potana palanahara tarapha bolavata raho ane sirka karavavala'o manthi na tha'i java

allaha ta'ala sathe bija ko'i pujyane na pokaro, allaha sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, dareka vastu nasta thanari che, sivaya teno cahero (allaha ta'alani hasti), teno ja adesa che ane tame teni ja tarapha pacha pheravavamam avaso
Sum loko'e anumana kari rakhyum che ke temana phakta a dava para, ke ame imana lavya che, ame temani kasoti karya vagara ja chodi da'isum
temanathi pahelana lokone pana ame kasoti kari, kharekhara allaha ta'ala saca lokone pana jani lese ane temane pana, je loko juththa che
sum je loko duskarmo kari rahya che, temane evum samaji rakhyum che ke te'o amara vasamam nahim rahe, a loko ketalum khotum samaji rahya che
jene allaha sathe mulakata karavani asa hoya, basa! Allaha ta'ala'e nakki karela samaya jarura avase, te badhum ja sambhalanara, badhum ja jananara che
ane dareka mahenata karanara potana phayada mate ja kare che, allaha ta'ala samagra srstithi beniyajha che
